message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to consider your proposal, but I think it's a bit low. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original offer and your offer. I'll sell the product to you for $8250.
I appreciate your willingness to meet us halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go a bit lower?
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $8100.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $7900?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $8050.
